landing-page.page-main-header: 열정적인 팬들과 함께 __applicationName__에 대한 토론을 나눠 보세요.
landing-page.start-discussions-text: 질문을 올리고, 소식을 공유해 보세요. 전 세계의 팬들과 함께 주제에 대해 열띤 토론을 나눠보세요.
landing-page.upvote-the-best-text: 맘에 드는 글에 추천을 남겨 보세요. 추천을 남겨 그 글이 인기 글에 오르도록 응원할 수 있습니다.
landing-page.share-your-knowledge-text: 맘에 드는 토론을 SNS에 공유해 친구들에게 보여 줄 수 있습니다.

main.connection-error: 인터넷에 연결할 수 없습니다. 다시 시도해 주세요.
main.modal-dialog-delete-all-message: __wikiName__에서 __userName__ 사용자가 올린 글을 모두 삭제하시겠습니까? 삭제된 글을 복구할 때는 개별적으로만 복구할 수 있으며 한번에 여러 글을 복구하는 것은 불가능합니다.
main.modal-dialog-delete-text: 이 글을 삭제하면 이 글의 내용이 모두 삭제됩니다.
main.modal-dialog-delete-reply-text: 이 댓글을 삭제하면 이 댓글의 내용이 모두 삭제됩니다.
main.modal-dialog-approve-text: 이 글을 신고 해제하면 더 이상 이 글에 신고 알림이 표시되지 않습니다.
main.modal-dialog-approve-reply-text: 이 댓글을 신고 해제하면 더 이상 이 댓글에 신고 알림이 표시되지 않습니다.
main.empty-forum-text: 아직 글이 없습니다. 첫 번째 글을 작성해 토론을 시작해 보세요!
main.reported-by-replied-to: __threadCreatorName__ 사용자에 대한 댓글, __reporterUserName__ 사용자에 의해 신고됨
main.reported-by-and-locked: This post is locked, and has been reported by __reporterUserName__.
main.reported-by-and-locked_plural: This post is locked, and has been reported by __reportedByNumberUsers__.
main.reported-to-moderators-and-locked: This post is locked, and has been reported.
main.follow-error-anon-cant-follow: Sign in to start following the discussion!
main.follow-error-anon-cant-see-followed-post: Sign in to see your followed posts.
main.reported-not-found-error: There are no reported posts or replies.
main.categories-edit-max-categories-info: You have reached the limit of allowed categories (__maxCategoriesCount__).
main.categories-edit-error-empty-category: Category name requires at least one character.
main.categories-delete-category-message: By deleting the category "__categoryName__" you will need to move the posts in that category to one of the following:
main.app-promotion-text: Take your fandom with you, download the app today!
main.app-promotion-text-details-page: Stay up to date on the go. Get the app now!
main.rename-category-length-error: Category name must be less than 20 characters.
main.rename-category-auth-error: You are logged out. Please sign in.
main.rename-category-general-error: Something went wrong, please try again.
main.welcome-message-text: Have fun browsing, creating, or replying to posts. Read our __guidelinesLinkTitle__ and you'll fit right in.
main.edit-hero-unit-hint-text:
Image Dimensions: 1240x200
jpg, gif or png. 10mb limit
main.no-followed-posts-text: Hit the “Follow” icon at the bottom of any post to fill your list with discussions that matter most to you. We’ll put them here and notify you of new activity.

user-activity.active-users-description: Who has published the most posts?
user-activity.reports-description: Who has reported the most content, and have those posts been deleted, approved, or not yet been processed by a moderator?
user-activity.moderator-actions-description: Which moderators have been the most active by deleting, approving, and locking posts, or changing a post’s category?

editor.post-error-anon-cant-post: Sign in to join the discussion!
editor.post-error-not-authorized: You cannot post because your account has been blocked.
editor.post-error-user-blocked-title: Your username or IP address has been blocked
editor.post-error-user-blocked-text:
The block was made by __blockerUsername__.
Expiration of block: __blockExpiry__
Reason given: __blockReason__
editor.overlay-message-text: Before posting, be sure to check out the __guidelinesLinkTitle__.
